name: Strategic Goals Report
query:
SELECT
    sg.goal_title AS "Goal Title:Data:280",
    sg.priority AS "Priority:Select:100",
    sg.status AS "Status:Select:100",
    sg.business_unit AS "Business Unit:Select:150",
    sg.category AS "Category:Data:120",
    sg.goal_owner AS "Goal Owner:Link/User:150",
    sg.owner_name AS "Goal Owner Name:Data:200",
    sg.start_date AS "Start Date:Date:150",
    sg.end_date AS "End Date:150:150"
FROM
    `tabStrategic Goal` AS sg
ORDER BY
    CASE sg.business_unit
        WHEN 'Sales & Marketing-SL' THEN 1
        WHEN 'Operations-OP' THEN 2
        WHEN 'Research & Development-R&D' THEN 3
        WHEN 'Finance & Accounting-FA' THEN 4
        WHEN 'Executive Division-EXE' THEN 5
        WHEN 'Corporate Strategy & Business Development-C&B' THEN 6
        WHEN 'Human Resources-HR-PD' THEN 7
        WHEN 'Legal & Compliance-L&C' THEN 8
        WHEN 'Information Technology-IT' THEN 9
        ELSE 10
    END,
    sg.goal_title ASC
